attributes.action: Remove Speed cameras from the United Kingdom as Nuisance to driving
attributes.additional_details: All my own police work, investigations, research and petitioning activities is available to read at www.bentcop.boards.net the main petitions holding site is at www.bentcop.biz
attributes.background: All Speed cameras are a nuisance and obstruction in the road and should be removed by section 149 of the highways act 1980 chapter 66

rejection.details: The open petition similar to yours is https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/128622
